data.title: Prince, Yuvika call pregnancy rumours 'fake'
data.meta_description: Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary were rumoured to be expecting their first child. However, the couple has now slammed the 'fake news'.
data.text:
Prince Narula, Yuvika Chaudhary refute pregnancy rumours: It’s fake news

New Delhi: A few reports recently stated that Tv and reality show personality Prince Narula and actress Yuvika Chaudhary are expecting their first child together. However, the couple has dismissed the rumours and called it “fake”. The couple clearly stated that they are “not pregnant”.

Prince Narula, Yuvika slam pregnancy rumours

Speculations over Yuvika and Prince’s expecting their first child sparked when the actor hinted at the possibility of the baby’s arrival during his appearance on Bharti Singh and Haarsh Limbachiyaa’s podcast. It so happened that the host asked about the couple’s plans for having a baby, Prince responded by saying, “Very soon”, leaving fans to speculate that Prince will soon become a dad.

Now, Prince reacted to the pregnancy rumours and cleard the air. He told News18, “It is fake news”.

On the other hand, Yuvika told HT, “Well, it is not at all true. We are not pregnant.”

“I don’t know how these rumours started and found them amusing. I wondered how the world knew about my pregnancy before me. People find something to write about and things just escalate. So, there is no point in reacting to it. I just read about the reports and laughed. We are not the ones who would hide the news. When we are expecting, we will announce and share the happy news with the world,” she added.

She also said that they are “trying to have a baby and want to expand the family” but that doesn’t mean that they are pregnant now.

During the conversation with Bharti, Prince also clarified that that they are planning to expand their family after buying their own home to ensure hassle-free and comfortable life for their child. Recently, the duo purchased a spacious apartment in Mumbai.

Prince, Yuvika love story

Prince and Yuvika’s love story blossomed on Bigg Boss 9. After dating for a few years, they tied the knot and have been happily married. Prince also revealed that he chased Yuvika for two years and their decision to marry wasn’t a rushed one.

Work front

Meanwhile, Yuvika is known for her role in Om Shanti Om. She also gained fame from her participation in Bigg Boss 9, Nach Baliye 9. On the other hand, Prince is known for winning reality shows. He has so far won Bigg Boss 9, MTV Roadies X2, and Splitsvilla 8.
